reviewText: A full game with lots of levels, cool boss fights, dazzling visuals, high energy soundtrack and makes use of the Vive motion controllers.\n\nSlamming a super metal ball across the field feels almost like an super hero experience.
voteText: 3 of 3 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText: At first I thought this was a cheap port from the gear VR and I would have had to use my head like a Weeble wobble controlling the paddle but I was happily mistaken. Playing this game in room scale on the vive and using the tracked motion controllers is truly how this game is meant to be played. This games shines on the Vive.\n\nMy only suggestion to the developer is to make the default paddle control the hand controllers so I don't have to squeeze the side button to activate them. You can also back down the haptic feedback to occur only when a paddle makes contact with a ball.
voteText: 3 of 3 people (100%) found this review helpful
